author: abbiendi
body:
Wrong configuration parameter, using an associator created with Validation/RecoMuon/python/associators_cfi.py  instead of the correct one located in SimTracker/TrackAssociatorProducers.
This creates an unnecessary dependence between muon and tracker validation.
The fix makes no change to the actually used parameters in the running workflows, hence no change at all in the results. However it is necessary for a custom workflow of the muon validation, which otherwise gets broken by this.

@davidcarbonis @boudoul
title: use the correct associator for tracker validation
